description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8jk2k","text":"This protocol is used to dissociate adult (8-10 wk) mouse ear \"on ice\" (in order to reduce gene expression artifacts). The cell yield is 9000 cells/mg (213000 cells total from 23 mg tissue), with 98% viable. The protocol involves a 2-layered dissociation, incubating on ice with bacillus licheniformis enzyme. The dissociation is augmented by the use of a dounce homogenizer to help break up the tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":279,"length":22,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.group_name: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

keywords: ear, cell dissociation, CAP, single cell
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"aghop","text":"Bacillus Licheniformis Enzyme Mix (1 mL per 23 mg tissue): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":59,"style":"bold"},{"offset":0,"length":23,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s1gq","text":"100 μL b. lich 100 mg/mL (10 mg/mL final conc. - Sigma, P5380)\n1 μL 0.5 M EDTA (0.5 mM final conc. - Sigma, A8806)\n899 μL DPBS (no Ca, Mg) ThermoFisher (cat. #14190) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ins5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eda25","text":"Preparing enzymes: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":19,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rqp6","text":"The enzyme is made up in DPBS (#14190). It is aliquoted and stored at -80 °C at 100 mg/mL in 100 μL aliquots.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ct92c","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4ckj","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":8,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57mt0","text":"Bovine Serum Albumin - Sigma (A8806)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7crlj","text":"Hypothermosol FRS – Sigma (H4416)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2e47b","text":"Red Blood Cell Lysing Buffer – Sigma (R7757)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvjn4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d209i","text":"Required supplies:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fire","text":"2 mL dounce homogenizer – Bellco (1984-10002)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e2l1","text":"Centrifuge for 1.5 mL, 15 mL conicals ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78i9n","text":"Pipettes and pipet tips ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21u1d","text":"15 ml Conicals (MLS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8o1e","text":"1.5 mL tubes (MLS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8le26","text":"30 µM filters - Miltenyi (130-098-458) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erdp3","text":"Petri dishes (MLS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be0q9","text":"Razor blades (MLS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4r5m","text":"Ice bucket w/ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6mu8","text":"Hemocytometers - InCyto Neubauer Improved (DHC-NO1-5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"5sh49","text":"Dissect out ear tissue and place in ice-cold hypothermosol on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jm3a","text":"Using forceps, transfer ear tissue to petri dish on ice. Mince ear tissue thoroughly on ice for 3-4 min on ice into 1-mm3 pieces using razor blade while manipulating tissue with forceps \u2013 you will need to use grinding motion and vigorously break up tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":57,"length":71,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f8q8t","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"9u925","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"EC0FC000C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","duration":240,"label":"mince tissue","step_guid":"8B60C600C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}}],"guid":"8B60C600C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","id":671765,"previous_guid":"8B533170C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","section":"Isolating tissue"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bavfs","text":"Place 23 mg minced tissue into 1 mL B. Lich enzyme cocktail. Incubate on ice.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":6,"length":19,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":78,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"748tf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"F97FB100C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","amount":"23","unit":5,"label":"tissue","step_guid":"8B60ED10C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}}],"guid":"8B60ED10C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","id":671766,"previous_guid":"8B60C600C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","section":"1st layer"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7fl21","text":"Shake every min; triturate every 2 min with p1000 w\/tip cut (start triturating at 2 min) for 20 minutes.    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":105,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":106,"length":1,"key":1},{"offset":107,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":[]},{"key":"ee4r2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"82m16","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c4jhu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"07C05F80C8AF11E8BE7EB3337322B388","duration":60,"label":"shake vigorously","step_guid":"8B611420C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"10568DE0C8AF11E8BE7EB3337322B388","duration":120,"label":"triturate 10x","step_guid":"8B611420C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"5C2041D0C8AF11E8BE7EB3337322B388","duration":1200,"label":"digest on ice","step_guid":"8B611420C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}}],"guid":"8B611420C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","id":671767,"previous_guid":"8B60ED10C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","section":"1st layer"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"codjj","text":"After 20 mins of triturating on ice, use pipet to transfer digest mix to 2 mL dounce homogenizer. Use 10 strokes of Pestle A every 2 min (4 series total, 8 min). Digest mix should become turbid. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":50,"length":46,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":194,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"1kujq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f7unq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"35AA37E0C8AF11E8BE7EB3337322B388","duration":120,"label":"dounce homogenize","step_guid":"8B613B30C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}}],"guid":"8B613B30C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","id":671768,"previous_guid":"8B611420C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","section":"1st layer"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ah881","text":"At 28 min total digest time, let tissue chunks settle in dounce homogenizer for 2 min. Transfer 90% of supernatant (containing released cells) using 1 mL serological pipet onto a 30 \u00b5M filter placed on a 15 mL conical.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":3,"length":24,"style":"bold"},{"offset":96,"length":46,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"65rp8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"7qvt3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"77C45E30C8AF11E8BE7EB3337322B388","duration":120,"label":"let tissue settle","step_guid":"8B613B31C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}}],"guid":"8B613B31C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","id":671769,"previous_guid":"8B613B30C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","section":"1st layer"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"df32b","text":"Rinse filter w\/5 mL ice-cold PBS\/BSA 0.04%. Save flow through containing released cells on ice and keep filter on tube for 2nd layer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":44,"length":89,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"8B616240C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","id":671770,"previous_guid":"8B613B31C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","section":"1st layer"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3bkqn","text":"Add additional 1 mL b. lich enzyme mix to residual tissue chunks in dounce homogenizer. Continue incubating on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ke11","text":"Use 10 strokes of pestle A every 2 min. for 15 additional minutes (45 min. total time).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":65,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":87,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":88,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7bj0j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9lbua","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"F282F1E0C8AF11E8BE7EB3337322B388","duration":120,"label":"dounce","step_guid":"8B61B060C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"F9FBC960C8AF11E8BE7EB3337322B388","duration":900,"label":"additional digest time","step_guid":"8B61B060C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388"}}],"guid":"8B61B060C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","id":671772,"previous_guid":"8B618950C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","section":"2nd layer"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"557me","text":"Transfer entire volume to same 30 \u00b5M filter on 15 mL conical. Rinse with additional 5 mL ice-cold PBS\/BA 0.04%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":60,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"8BBD8C00C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","id":671773,"previous_guid":"8B61B060C8AE11E8BE7EB3337322B388","section":"2nd layer"}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aj3l8","text":"Centrifuge cells for 300 g for 5 min at 4 \u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Preparing cells for single cell sequencing

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"9djb4","text":"Remove supernatant & re-suspend in 100 \u00b5L ice-cold PBS\/BSA 0.04% (leave in 15 mL conical).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Preparing cells for single cell sequencing

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"efpp8","text":"Add 1 mL RBC lysis buffer to cell mix. Triturate 10X. Let sit on ice for 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Preparing cells for single cell sequencing

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"6kr04","text":"Add 12 mL ice-cold PBS\/BSA 0.04% to dilute RBC lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Preparing cells for single cell sequencing

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"aurbk","text":"Spin 300 g for five min. Remove supernatant. Re-suspend in 100-200 \u00b5L PBS\/BSA 0.04%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Preparing cells for single cell sequencing
Preparing cells for single cell sequencing

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"1pri4","text":"Adjust concentration to 1,000 cells\/\u00b5L for Chromium or 100 cells\/\u00b5L for DropSeq.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
steps.section: Preparing cells for single cell sequencing
